TABLE.NAME: cmi5launch
TABLE.COMMENT: Settings for an individual CMI5 activity.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Main ID assigned by Moodle

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course cmi5launch activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of course

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the cmi5launch activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: cmi5activityid
FIELD.COMMENT: The LMS id

FIELD.NAME: registrationid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course registration ID returned by CMI5 player. We want to use this to connect to LRS.

FIELD.NAME: returnurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Tenants return URL, where it will go after closing course from launch URL

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the course id returned by CMI5 Player

FIELD.NAME: cmi5verbid
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique verb id

FIELD.NAME: cmi5expiry
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of days to expire completion after

FIELD.NAME: overridedefaults
FIELD.COMMENT: Determines if the activity is inheriting the global defaults or has overriden them at the activity level.

FIELD.NAME: cmi5multipleregs
FIELD.COMMENT: Allow multiple registrations (not recommended)

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the course was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last time the course was modified

FIELD.NAME: courseinfo
FIELD.COMMENT: The full string of course info

FIELD.NAME: aus
FIELD.COMMENT: The AUs of the course, saved as array

TABLE.NAME: cmi5launch_usercourse
TABLE.COMMENT: A users particular instance of CMI5 Activity

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Main ID for tracking.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course ID, assigned by CMI5 player

FIELD.NAME: moodlecourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course ID, assigned by Moodle for context and data tracking. (Id field in cmi5launch table)

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID, combined with courseid can be used to retrieve unique records

FIELD.NAME: cmi5activityid
FIELD.COMMENT: The LMS ID

FIELD.NAME: registrationid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course registration ID returned by CMI5 player. We want to use this to connect to LRS.

FIELD.NAME: returnurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Tenants return url, where it will go after closing course from launch url

FIELD.NAME: aus
FIELD.COMMENT: The AUs of the course, their DB ids, saved as array

FIELD.NAME: ausgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: All the AUs and their grades (overall session grades) saved in this format: AU lmsid => [AU Title => [Scores from that title's sessions] ]

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The current overall grade (based on grading type) for the cmi5 activity

TABLE.NAME: cmi5launch_player
TABLE.COMMENT: Store variables for API communication with CMI5 player.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of returned course IN MOODLE (this id matches with field id in cmi5launch table. Moodle assigns id'ssequentially. CMI5 ALSO will assign course ids. These are separate.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name field for course name IN MOODLE, may be different than course name in it's own xml file

FIELD.NAME: tenantid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of returned course

FIELD.NAME: tenantname
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the user for the cmi5 player (this is found in table cmi5launch_lrs, investiagte ways to get-MB)

FIELD.NAME: tenanttoken
FIELD.COMMENT: This is a bearer token for tenant used to retreive and post courses(this is found in table cmi5launch_lrs, investiagte ways to get-MB)

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the returned course generated BY CMI5 player

FIELD.NAME: launchmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the course's retrieved URL opens in it's own window or new one

FIELD.NAME: returnurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Tenants return url, where it will go after closing course from launch url

FIELD.NAME: homepage
FIELD.COMMENT: Tenants homepage(URL)

FIELD.NAME: registrationid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course registration ID returned by CMI5 player. We want to use this for LRS instead

FIELD.NAME: sessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id created when an AU launch URL is requested

FIELD.NAME: launchurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Returned launch url from cmi5 player

FIELD.NAME: cmi5playerurl
FIELD.COMMENT: CMI5 player url

FIELD.NAME: cmi5playerport
FIELD.COMMENT: CMI5 player port

TABLE.NAME: cmi5launch_sessions
TABLE.COMMENT: A users individual session. One AU can have multiple sessions.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Main ID for tracking, assigned by Moodle.

FIELD.NAME: sessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The session ID. This is created by cmi5 player and returned with URL request

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID, which combined with course ID can be used to retrieve unique records

FIELD.NAME: moodlecourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course ID, assigned by Moodle for context and data tracking. (Id field in cmi5launch table)

FIELD.NAME: registrationscoursesausid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID assigned by the cmi5 player to AUs

FIELD.NAME: tenantname
FIELD.COMMENT: The tenant name

FIELD.NAME: createdat
FIELD.COMMENT: Time a session started (string that is returned by CMI5 player)

FIELD.NAME: updatedat
FIELD.COMMENT: Time a session was updated (string that is returned by Cmi5 player)

FIELD.NAME: code
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique code for each session assigned by CMI5 plyer

FIELD.NAME: launchtokenid
FIELD.COMMENT: Launchtoken assigned by CMI5 player

FIELD.NAME: lastrequesttime
FIELD.COMMENT: Time a session was last requested. String as that is what is returned from player.

FIELD.NAME: launchmode
FIELD.COMMENT: Launch mode, separate from launchmethod. It can be 'Normal', 'Browse', or 'Review

FIELD.NAME: masteryscore
FIELD.COMMENT: The amount toward mastery score.

FIELD.NAME: score
FIELD.COMMENT: The score of session (returned from 'result' parameter in statements from LRS).

FIELD.NAME: islaunched
FIELD.COMMENT: Has session been launched?.

FIELD.NAME: isinitialized
FIELD.COMMENT: Has session been intialized?.

FIELD.NAME: initializedat
FIELD.COMMENT: Time a session was initialized. String as that is what is returned from player.

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Time a session lasted (from 'result' parameter)

FIELD.NAME: iscompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Has session been completed?

FIELD.NAME: ispassed
FIELD.COMMENT: Has session been passed?

FIELD.NAME: isfailed
FIELD.COMMENT: Has session been failed?.

FIELD.NAME: isterminated
FIELD.COMMENT: Has session been terminated?.

FIELD.NAME: isabandoned
FIELD.COMMENT: Has session been abandoned?.

FIELD.NAME: progress
FIELD.COMMENT: The full string of session progress reported from LRS

FIELD.NAME: launchmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the course's retrieved URL opens in it's own window or new one

FIELD.NAME: launchurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Returned launch url from cmi5 player

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the AU (assigned by Moodle).

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID, which combined with course ID can be used to retrieve unique records.

FIELD.NAME: attempt
FIELD.COMMENT: The attempt of the au, ie, first, second, third

FIELD.NAME: launchmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the course's retrieved URL opens in it's own window or new one

FIELD.NAME: lmsid
FIELD.COMMENT: The lmsid id from the course packet. The singular CMI5 compliant id

FIELD.NAME: moodlecourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course ID, assigned by Moodle for context and data tracking. (Id field in cmi5launch table)

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: The ending to be added to url that takes you to a specific AU

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The AU activity type.

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The au title (from course package).

FIELD.NAME: moveon
FIELD.COMMENT: The requirements for AU to be marked as done.

FIELD.NAME: auindex
FIELD.COMMENT: The AU index

FIELD.NAME: parents
FIELD.COMMENT: AU's parent activities.

FIELD.NAME: objectives
FIELD.COMMENT: AUs objectives.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: AUs description.

FIELD.NAME: activitytype
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity type of AU.

FIELD.NAME: masteryscore
FIELD.COMMENT: The amount it counts toward mastery score.

FIELD.NAME: completed
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether an AU has met completed criteria (0 if false, 1 if true)

FIELD.NAME: passed
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether an AU has met passed criteria (0 if false, 1 if true)

FIELD.NAME: inprogress
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether an AU is in progress or not (been started) (0 if false, 1 if true)

FIELD.NAME: noattempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether an AU has been attempted (0 if false, 1 if true)

FIELD.NAME: satisfied
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether an AU has been SATISIFED (0 if false, 1 if true)

FIELD.NAME: sessions
FIELD.COMMENT: The session ids of the AU, saved as array

FIELD.NAME: scores
FIELD.COMMENT: The sessions scores, saved as array

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The overall grade (based on what grade type setting is)
